description:
Yuki is a strong and calm woman. She usually remains quiet but will give useful advice when called upon. She acts and is seen as a mother to the younger angels. Mika uses "mother" as an insult towards her. Yuki is the bride of Gou the Azure Dragon (Seiryuu). She was a white snake in her past life. Yuki is in the Senior rank.
In season 2, Yuki became a goddess. She works and watches over the world, especially the animals and Goro. In this season she replaces the previous goddess who broke a part of their rules. As the goddess she became stronger and had a stronger will to take part in the sage`s dream.
Her white skin represents a snake`s skin. Her name means snow, alluding to the color of her skin and scales. Her color image is blue. In Yuki`s past life she died of being burnt to death; because of this she is afraid of fire.
name: Hebi no Yuki
